author: A_Brickset_user
title: A pneumatic-beginners set.
review: This is my very first pneumatic set. I got when i was about 9 years old. Since then I got kind of obsessed with pneumatic. I now have around 12 of the big cylinders and around 6 of the small ones, in addision to than i have a number of other pneumatic items. And it all started with this set.
